page.title: 17MY WEEKEND by AMY
page.content: On Saturday I wake up at 7.00 am.I dress in my riding clothes,wash,and then dash downstairs.I eat my breakfast of sugarpuffs.I go down through the garden to the car.My destination is the Glebe Riding Stables where my pony,Winkie,is waiting for me.First I groom him and then I ride.I stay at the Glebe all day doing various jobs like tack cleaning,sweeping the yard and lastly taking the horses to the field where they will stay all night.My Grandma and Grandad pick me up.I go home to their house as Mum and Dad are at Wimbledon watching the tennis.On Sunday morning Mum and Dad collect me as we are going on a car rally treasure hunt.Afterwards there is a barbeque.When we arrive home I do my homework and watch T.V.before going to bed.
